name: superagent-get-chunked
description: Adds support to the superagent library for chunked-transfer encoded responses when in the browser.

scripts.build: browserify -t uglifyify index.js --debug -o ./test/browser/superagent-get-chunked.js && echo 'onmessage = function(e) {' > ./test/browser/superagent-get-chunked-worker.js && browserify -t uglifyify superagent-get-chunked.js --debug >> ./test/browser/superagent-get-chunked-worker.js && echo '};' >> ./test/browser/superagent-get-chunked-worker.js && uglifyjs ./test/browser/superagent-get-chunked-worker.js -c --debug -o ./test/browser/superagent-get-chunked-worker.min.js
scripts.build:uncompressed: browserify index.js -o ./test/browser/superagent-get-chunked.js && echo 'onmessage = function(e) {' > ./test/browser/superagent-get-chunked-worker.min.js && browserify superagent-get-chunked.js >> ./test/browser/superagent-get-chunked-worker.min.js && echo '};' >> ./test/browser/superagent-get-chunked-worker.min.js
scripts.start: echo 'Once build finishes, visit http://localhost:8080' && npm run build && cd ./test/browser && http-server

author: Anders Riutta
